title: Distribution of a COVID-19 Vaccine, If Maricopa County Sours on Trump, So Will Suburbs Everywhere
itunes:title: Distribution of a COVID-19 Vaccine, If Maricopa County Sours on Trump, So Will Suburbs Everywhere
description:
Dr. Eric Toner, Senior Scholar at the Johns Hopkins Center for Health Security at the Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses providing an ethical framework for making decisions about allocation and distribution of a COVID-19 vaccine when there initially is a limited supply. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek National Correspondent Josh Green explain the outsize political importance of Maricopa County in Arizona. Jeff Tannenbaum, Founder at Titan Grove, talks about choosing investments with ESG in mind. And we Drive to the Close with Ron Carson, CEO of the Carson Group.

Hosts: Jason Kelly and Alix Steel. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
